description: Reserve.swapAndLiquify(uint256) (contracts/Reserve.sol#63-82) ignores return value by uniswapV2Pair.mint(timelock) (contracts/Reserve.sol#80)

Reentrancy in Reserve.buyAndBurn(uint256) (contracts/Reserve.sol#40-56):
	External calls:
	- SafeERC20.safeApprove(address(usdc),address(uniswapV2Router),usdcAmount) (contracts/Reserve.sol#45)
	- uniswapV2Router.swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens(usdcAmount,0,path,address(this),block.timestamp) (contracts/Reserve.sol#46-52)
	- require(bool,string)(token.burn(tokensSwapped),Reserve: burn failed) (contracts/Reserve.sol#54)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- BuyAndBurn(tokensSwapped,usdcAmount) (contracts/Reserve.sol#55)

	- [uniswapV2Router.swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens(usdcAmount,0,path,address(this),block.timestamp)](contracts/Reserve.sol#L46-L52)

	Event emitted after the call(s):

description:
Reentrancy in Reserve.swapAndLiquify(uint256) (contracts/Reserve.sol#63-82):
	External calls:
	- usdcReceived = _swapTokensForUSDC(otherHalf) (contracts/Reserve.sol#72)
		- (success,data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(0x095ea7b3,to,value)) (contracts/libraries/SafeERC20.sol#32)
		- SafeERC20.safeApprove(address(token),address(uniswapV2Router),tokenAmount) (contracts/Reserve.sol#89)
		- uniswapV2Router.swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens(tokenAmount,0,path,address(this),block.timestamp) (contracts/Reserve.sol#90-96)
	- SafeERC20.safeTransfer(address(token),address(uniswapV2Pair),half) (contracts/Reserve.sol#78)
	- SafeERC20.safeTransfer(address(usdc),address(uniswapV2Pair),usdcReceived) (contracts/Reserve.sol#79)
	- uniswapV2Pair.mint(timelock) (contracts/Reserve.sol#80)
	Event emitted after the call(s):

		- [(success,data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(0x095ea7b3,to,value))](contracts/libraries/SafeERC20.sol#L32)

		- [uniswapV2Router.swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens(tokenAmount,0,path,address(this),block.timestamp)](contracts/Reserve.sol#L90-L96)
	- [SafeERC20.safeTransfer(address(token),address(uniswapV2Pair),half)](contracts/Reserve.sol#L78)
	- [SafeERC20.safeTransfer(address(usdc),address(uniswapV2Pair),usdcReceived)](contracts/Reserve.sol#L79)

description:
Reentrancy in Ledgity._transfer(address,address,uint256) (contracts/Ledgity.sol#163-187):
	External calls:
	- priceOracle.tryUpdate() (contracts/Ledgity.sol#171)
	- _swapAndLiquifyOrCollect(contractTokenBalance) (contracts/Ledgity.sol#185)
		- reserve.swapAndLiquify(contractTokenBalance) (contracts/Ledgity.sol#155)
		- reserve.swapAndCollect(contractTokenBalance) (contracts/Ledgity.sol#157)
		- priceOracle.tryUpdate() (contracts/Ledgity.sol#171)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _swapAndLiquifyOrCollect(contractTokenBalance) (contracts/Ledgity.sol#185)
		- lastTransactionAt[sender] = block.timestamp (contracts/Ledgity.sol#168)
markdown:

	- [priceOracle.tryUpdate()](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L171)
	- [_swapAndLiquifyOrCollect(contractTokenBalance)](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L185)
		- [reserve.swapAndLiquify(contractTokenBalance)](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L155)
		- [reserve.swapAndCollect(contractTokenBalance)](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L157)
		- [priceOracle.tryUpdate()](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L171)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [_swapAndLiquifyOrCollect(contractTokenBalance)](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L185)
		- [lastTransactionAt[sender] = block.timestamp](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L168)

description:
Reserve.constructor(address,address,address,address).timelock_ (contracts/Reserve.sol#28) lacks a zero-check on :
		- timelock = timelock_ (contracts/Reserve.sol#36)

Reentrancy in Ledgity._transfer(address,address,uint256) (contracts/Ledgity.sol#163-187):
	External calls:
	- priceOracle.tryUpdate() (contracts/Ledgity.sol#171)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- super._transfer(sender,recipient,amount) (contracts/Ledgity.sol#174)
		- _rOwned[address(this)] = _rOwned[address(this)].add(rAccumulation) (contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#197)
		- _rOwned[sender] = _rOwned[sender].sub(rAmount) (contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#178)
		- _rOwned[recipient] = _rOwned[recipient].add(rTransferAmount) (contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#182)
	- super._transfer(sender,recipient,amount) (contracts/Ledgity.sol#174)
		- _rTotal = _rTotal.sub(rFee) (contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#192)
	- super._transfer(sender,recipient,amount) (contracts/Ledgity.sol#174)
		- _tFeeTotal = _tFeeTotal.add(tFee) (contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#193)
	- super._transfer(sender,recipient,amount) (contracts/Ledgity.sol#174)
		- _tOwned[address(this)] = _tOwned[address(this)].add(tAccumulation) (contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#199)
		- _tOwned[sender] = _tOwned[sender].sub(tAmount) (contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#180)
		- _tOwned[recipient] = _tOwned[recipient].add(tTransferAmount) (contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#184)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [Ledgity._transfer(address,address,uint256)](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L163-L187):
	External calls:
	- [priceOracle.tryUpdate()](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L171)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [super._transfer(sender,recipient,amount)](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L174)
		- [_rOwned[address(this)] = _rOwned[address(this)].add(rAccumulation)](contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#L197)
		- [_rOwned[sender] = _rOwned[sender].sub(rAmount)](contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#L178)
		- [_rOwned[recipient] = _rOwned[recipient].add(rTransferAmount)](contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#L182)
	- [super._transfer(sender,recipient,amount)](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L174)
		- [_rTotal = _rTotal.sub(rFee)](contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#L192)
	- [super._transfer(sender,recipient,amount)](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L174)
		- [_tFeeTotal = _tFeeTotal.add(tFee)](contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#L193)
	- [super._transfer(sender,recipient,amount)](contracts/Ledgity.sol#L174)
		- [_tOwned[address(this)] = _tOwned[address(this)].add(tAccumulation)](contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#L199)
		- [_tOwned[sender] = _tOwned[sender].sub(tAmount)](contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#L180)
		- [_tOwned[recipient] = _tOwned[recipient].add(tTransferAmount)](contracts/libraries/ReflectToken.sol#L184)
